title: UK's best restaurants for 2019 from fine dining to everyday eateries
text:

Foodies, get ready to add to your bucket lists as the UK's best restaurants have been revealed for 2019.

We're talking everything from the best fine dining spots to more casual (and in some cases, budget-friendly) eateries.

TripAdvisor unveiled the results of its annual Travellers’ Choice Awards for Restaurants, which took into consideration the quantity and quality of the reviews left on the platform to determine where foodies can find the creme de la creme.

The fine dining category looked at 'high-end, special occasion restaurants known for impeccable food and service' - and topping the list was Adam's in Birmingham, which wowed for its mouthwatering dishes and friendly service.

Adam's actually proved a hit worldwide as it was also named the tenth best restaurant in the world, as well as the sixth best in Europe. It's also the second time it's topped the UK list, having previously won the accolade in 2015.

(Image: Courtesy of TripAdvisor)

Adam Stokes, who runs the restaurant with wife Natasha, said in a statement: "We are absolutely thrilled to be awarded number one in the UK and 10th in the world in the Travellers’ Choice Awards for Fine Dining Restaurants.

"This is our sixth proud year of being included in these customer focused awards and it is a huge achievement. I am immensely proud of our whole team AKA the ‘Adam’s family’.

"With special credit to our Service Manager Shaun who has been with Adam’s since day one and really embodies all that the 'Adam’s family' is about. Thank you also to all our guests, old and new and those regulars we see time and time again."

(Image: Courtesy of TripAdvisor)

As for everyday eateries?

These were picked based on being 'restaurants that provide great meals for any occasion that don’t break the bank'.

(Image: Courtesy of TripAdvisor)

The Dome in Edinburgh took the top spot, impressing with its culinary feats which showcase some seriously tasty Scottish favourites - not to mention its photogenic afternoon teas in its Georgian Tea Room never fail to be a hit with the Instagram crowd.

Another Edinburgh restaurant took one of the top three spots too; Makars Gourmet Mash Bar where you can find some hearty local fare and friendly staff.

(Image: Courtesy of TripAdvisor)

Meanwhile, London's Steak & Co won over diners thanks to the steaks served on hot plates with heaps of delicious sides.
